titleStmt.title: A proclamacion devised by the Kynges hygnes, with the aduyse of his counsayle, that his subiectes be warned to auoyde (in some c[ase]s) the daunger and penaltie of the statute of Provision and Premunire.
titleStmt.author: England. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum Privilegio,
